nodes.text: The family of Xoxtin, a female Senior Lieutenant who served aboard the Imperial Star Destroyer Chimaera, was one of the Coruscant elite. The family was also close friends to Emperor Palpatine's senior adviser on Mid Rim affairs. When Commander Kimmund asked her to speak to Xoxtin about the positioning of the First Legion's transport Darkhawk inside the Chimaera, Commodore Karyn Faro noted that annoying Xoxtin and her family at a time when Faro was uncertain of where her future lay, could prove fatal.
